title: 美國參議院外交委員會主席里施：香港人有權擁有中國政府多年前所承諾的自治 所有暴力鎮壓都不能接受

replies.msg:
The people of Hong Kong have a right to the autonomy they were promised by the Chinese government years ago. The Hong Kong government should engage with its people to prevent any further escalation. All acts of violent suppression are unacceptable.
